name: Mazone Group
tag_list: fashion, accessoires, mode, shoes, lunettes, glasses, discount, prix-exceptionnels, bons-prix, ventes-prives, jeans, jackets, chemises, t-shirts, suits, costumes, luxe, casual, jewelry
overview:
Mazone Group is a private sales e-commerce site (site de ventes privées) for global fashion brands in Morocco. This is the member-only destination for a life of style, where Members enjoy discovering Boutiques that open daily – and stay open for a several days. A community where Members shape the experience – and enhance the excitement – by inviting their friends. A highly effective channel for brands in apparel, accessories, footwear for men, women, and children, as well as home.

Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Mazonema/105908666179839
